alert.note: Alert for Guadalupe Mountains of Eddy County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 29 at 12:51PM MDT until March 30 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM CDT /NOON MDT/ WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 45 to 55 mph with gusts up to 75 mph expected. * WHERE...Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains, and Davis Mountains. * WHEN...Until 1 PM CDT /noon MDT/ Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Severe turbulence near the mountains will be hazardous for low flying light aircraft. Blowing dust may reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. The high winds can topple trees, down power lines and damage some structures.
